item.title: Collective Behavior During Dam Passage
item.description: In this project I use a bootstrap method to test a radio-telemetry dataset of Chinook and sockeye salmon for evidence of collective navigation while using fish ladders to pass dams.

item.title: Logistically-Constrained Optimal Spatial Sampling Design
item.description: In this project I investigate the use of sparse precision matrices and mixed integer/linear programs to efficient conduct logistically-constrained optimal spatial sampling design.

item.title: Source Inference
item.description: In this project I investigate the use of stochastic PDEs to conduct inference on the source term of a linear PDE.
